message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me than that. Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's value to me, I would like to propose $12,500 as a counteroffer.
